alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 4:02AM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In New York, Western Albany and Western Greene Counties. In Vermont, Western Windham County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the early part of the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
